description: ff. 137. 180 x 135; 115 x 85 mm. 17 lin. 16th cen. Anon. commentary on the work of Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Jabbār al-Niffarī (fl. 352/963); same as Bodl. I, no. 352 (see also Bodl. II, p. 579, where the incipit is quoted): Brockelmann, GAL, I, 217(7). Incip.: ... الحمد لله الاول فبل الکون والمکان
title: Sharḥ al-Mawāqif fī ʻilm al-taṣawwuf
subject: Niffarī, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Jabbār, d. 965—Mawāqif
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
